articles.content:

articles.title: 'Asian version of blackface': Slant-eyed masks, 'Wuhan girls' chant at Paris dinner party condemned by big names in fashion - TODAYonline
articles.description: HONG KONG — The fashion world's favourite deejay, Mr Michel Gaubert, a long-time collaborator of top brands such as Chanel, Fendi, Dior and Valentino, has come under fire for posting a video from an Asian-themed dinner he attended in Paris.
